Quality Education.reason: The course is a graduate-level seminar focused on providing specialized philosophical knowledge and critical thinking skills, directly contributing to tertiary education.
evidence: The aim of this seminar is to critically rethink the philosophy of Cassirer and Goodman in an East Asian context.
Students should become familiar with the most important ideas and arguments of the two philosophers and acquire a solid knowledge of the central texts.
